SENT.plain: Eye and brain involvement in congenital muscular dystrophies (CMD) constitute a distinct group with a spectrum of brain malformations
We report two such CMD patients among our series of 58 cases with CMD
Despite known clinical and neuroradiological overlap, we tend to classify them into specific syndromes, though this may not be accurate
Molecular genetic studies hopefully will be the answer
Our cases are the continuum of increasingly reported CMD cases with severe brain manifestations, which come from the area geographically far away from those of original descriptions
